strings.PLUGIN_DESCR: Allows quickly changing, previewing, and exporting the admin.xml theme file. Requires GS Custom Settings 0.4+.
strings.primary_1_label: Non-active tab background, active main tab text hover
strings.secondary_1_label: Side tab active background, page subtitles
strings.plugin_lang_label: Choose an existing theme;by;Set;Export current theme;Theme name;Author;Author URL;Export admin.xml;This is just a preview, don't forget to save updates to confirm.
